scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p www/js/build  &&  snowpack  &&  cp -pr  node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs  www/js/build/  &&  ( [ -e /.dockerenv ]  ||  scripts/get-mdapi-json.sh )
scripts.serve: ( sleep 2; open http://localhost:8888 ) & node_modules/.bin/http-server www -p 8888 --proxy http://localhost:8888?
